name: Camp Night (Dmitri Nikolai)
description:
you take a break from a city and go camping with your friends. Youre always doing activites with them so youre never alone. 

Even though you think you might be

This game isnt finished so i apologize for the disappointment. This game was uploaded for the brackeys game jam 2022 event. 

CONTROLS

wasd- move

ctrl- Sprint

Space- jump

E - interact

esc- Pause Menu

The interact function for the camp does work but idk sometimes doesnt work and you have to try from different angles and get very close, the best place where it works is from the front and very close
